message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm confident you'll find it worth it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to go up to $110, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $110?
I understand you're hesitant, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $115. I'm willing to throw in a small discount, so I'll meet you at $112.50. That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you reconsider and meet me at $110?
